ModMetaData.name: Advanced Colonist Intelligence
ModMetaData.author: Sean
ModMetaData.description:
Transform your colonists into autonomous AI-driven characters with real intelligence.
[h1]Features[/h1] [list] [*] [b]LLM Integration[/b] - Connect to Grok, OpenAI, Claude, Ollama, or LM Studio [*] [b]Full Character Context[/b] - AI receives complete backstory, traits, skills, relationships, mood, and memories [*] [b]Autonomous Decision Making[/b] - Selected colonists make their own choices based on personality [*] [b]Thought Bubbles[/b] - See what your AI colonists are thinking [*] [b]Journal System[/b] - Review a log of all AI decisions and reasoning [*] [b]Configurable Autonomy[/b] - Control whether AI can refuse orders, draft themselves, etc. [*] [b]Event-Driven[/b] - AI reacts to job completion, threats, injuries, social interactions, and more [/list]
[h1]How It Works[/h1] 1. Configure your LLM provider and API key in Mod Settings 2. Select which colonists should have AI brains 3. Watch them live their lives with genuine agency
[h1]Supported Providers[/h1] [list] [*] [b]Grok[/b] (x.ai) - Recommended [*] [b]OpenAI[/b] (GPT-4, GPT-4o-mini) [*] [b]Claude[/b] (Anthropic) [*] [b]Ollama[/b] (Local, free) [*] [b]LM Studio[/b] (Local, free) [/list]
[h1]Note[/h1] This mod requires an API key for cloud providers (Grok, OpenAI, Claude) or a local LLM server (Ollama, LM Studio) to function.
API calls have costs - monitor your usage!
